Rank_CMDName.label: Command for showing a users rank
Rank_CMDName.tooltip: The command for showing a users rank

Rank_CMDIsGlobalCooldown.label: Global cooldown
Rank_CMDIsGlobalCooldown.tooltip: This shows if the command gets global cooldown

Rank_CMDUsage.label: The usage of this command
Rank_CMDUsage.tooltip: This is shown when fetching help for this command

Rank_CMDDescription.value: Shows the rank for the given user in the leaderboard (or the own, if none given)
Rank_CMDDescription.label: Description

Rank_CMDFetchNumber.label: Fetch amount
Rank_CMDFetchNumber.tooltip: The amount of users, this command fetches, since the chatbot cannot fetch positions directly

Rank_CMDResponse.label: Response (available tags: $name, $rank, $currency, $currencyname)
Rank_CMDResponse.tooltip: The response, if this command is triggered

Rank_CMDNoCurrencyYet.label: Response (available tags: $name, $currencyname)
Rank_CMDNoCurrencyYet.tooltip: The response, if this command is triggered, but the user has no coins yet
